segments.text: Good afternoon . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got this important letter to send to Hainan . Can I send it by registered mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much will I have to pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are the letter and the money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a moment . It seems that your letter is overweight . Let me weight it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid it is . So you will have to pay two yuan extra . The total charge is four yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Here is the money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are the stamps and your receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What shall I do with the receipt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can keep it until the addressee tells you that the letter has been delivered . It is the proof that you sent the letter if it fails to arrive .
segments.speaker: S2
